vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συνωδίνω [ῑ],
to be in travail together, σ. κακοῖς share in the agony of woes, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; οἱ ἄρρενες ταῖς θηλείαις σ. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]:—passive, στεροπῇσι συνωδίνοντο κεραυνοί [Refs 4th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to join in the pains of childbirth, suffer agonylabor together
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to join in the pains of childbirth, suffer agonylabor together
primarily to travail at the same time with; troponym suffer together, Rom. 8:22*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sufrir gran dolor juntos, compartir el mismo dolor (como una mujer con dolores de parto)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 一如生產之痛的痛苦
2) 同受苦難 (羅 8:22)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 一如生产之痛的痛苦
2) 同受苦难 (罗 8:22)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cùng nhau cảm thấy đau đớn khi sinh con ; être en travail ensemble. σύν (G4862) + ὠδίνω (G5605)
